评论详情: If you can’t decide, just do it! So cute and comfy

Why is everything seen inside out?? I had to cut the tags off so I can wear it the right way. Very oversized. I ordered a medium because I’m pregnant and it’s still huge. Should have gotten a small. Which I normally wear. Cute design, just need the manufacturers to actually pay attention.
I love this sweater so much I ordered a second one. It’s great quality,it fits great and the colors are beautiful. Highly recommend this sweater.

Fits perfectly! Slightly oversized. Good quality. Not too thick or thin. Plan on getting in more colors but not sure I really want to buy at $50. Can be dressed up or down. I purchased on sale for $30.
This sweater is so cozy and thick, such good quality!

I absolutely love this sweater. I’m 5’3 about 150lb and ordered a size M. This sweater pairs well with leggings and booties. The material is soft and is not form fitting, but not oversized. Definitely recommend.
Came just as described, but the sleeve was stained. Two inch black line across the sleeve. I was pretty upset because I wanted to wear it for a special occasion!
I wanted to like this sweater as the material is very soft, but the seams are inside out. I tried turning it inside out and the fit was much better but the tags were visible.

Seriously, like my favorite. Nutmeg color is sooo perfect and is my go to fashionable sweater I have. I haven't washed it yet but if somehow it shrinks a bit and not oversized 'enough' I'll just reorder a size up because I love it so much.
Amazing material quality and details. Great fit. Esp love the tight cuffs. So comfy and oversized but elevated

I love it! Perfect for the fall and winter.  If you are on the fence, just get it! It is great on! with leggings or jeans!!

This sweater is amazing quality.  Great price for the quality that you receive.  The color is perfect!  It has a wonderful shape for an oversized sweater and very cute sleeves.  I received many compliments when I wore this.  I will be buying another one in a different color!
Such a nice color and material. Washed many times and dried and never shrunk or ripped. Has an oversized fit which I love! Got it super cheap and I love it !!

I bought this same style from another brand in Nutmeg and loved it. I saw this brand had the same style on sale after Christmas so I bought black and the apricot checkered one. I love them both. I am 5’2”, about 120lbs and usually wear a size XS; I bought Small as this brand doesn’t carry XS and they both fit well except for the arms being a tiny bit long but it doesn’t look weird as the sweater is meant to be a little oversized. The black does attract fur from my white long haired cat but not as bad as some other materials. These sweaters do tend to get snags if you aren’t careful but they don’t visibly damage the top if you snip them off
It is not what I consider material.  I don’t like the material.

评论概述: Color not as dark as pictured
评论详情: I got the burgundy color and it is more of a dark maroon color versus a true burgundy. I still like it but it’s not exactly what I was expecting. The fit is good, oversized and covers my butt.

So cute! Ordered my normal size and it has a nice oversized fit. Thick quality material without the expensive price. Have worn and washed a couple times already and has seemed to hold up well and has good washability. Love that there are lots of color/pattern options.
Was pleased with the value of this sweater for the money. Washed well.
Really cozy, thick and stylish sweater. I bought it as a gift for a family friend. I highly recommend this sweater and definitely worth it :)
My favorite oversized sweater! I have it in three colors and will probably get more. Super cute with jeans or a mini skirt and boots! I love wearing it to work or out to dinner.

Classic. Expensive quality look. Comfy. Perfect weight and not too heavy. I bought the black and the beige whit check. I purchased the Small bc I didn’t want oversized look. Even though medium was recommended.

I threw it in a garment bag with my other clothes and laid it flat to dry and it was fine but I can tell it won't last forever because I'm not hand washing or using the delicate cycle.  But it's great otherwise.
Loved this sweater great make. Would order again
Shorter than pictured and I like wear tops that cover at least most of my rear. This one does not cover. Much shorter than pictured.
Sweater is as pictured. The fit is oversized. If you want the oversized look I would recommend ordering normal size, otherwise size down. Would definitely recommend and would order again.

I bought this just for my scarecrow costume for Halloween but ended up LOVING this sweater. I even wore it to Thanksgiving. It’s flattering, warm, cute, price is good. Overall it’s a great sweater and I’m thinking of ordering a different color. True to size

The garment was sealed with the plastic bag it came in. It picked it in a couple spots as I tore it apart. Didn’t want to bother sending it back.  Added to first review, I wore sweater for first time only to find the back label was attached to wrong side ( the outside) of sweater. I cut it off and wore a scarf only to come home and see another tag on the side of the sweater. Feel I should get my money back and not have to take back issues
SUCH great quality. Absolutely love.

Love this sweater! Usually wear a size small and went with that because other reviews said it was very oversized but wish I would have done a size up for more length to wear with leggings but great quality and really cute!
Soft pretty color
A little big so size down. I’m generally a medium but got a small in this and it fits perfectly oversized. It’s warm and comfortable.
I typically wear a large and it fits perfectly
Seams are inside out and you can see where they cut the tag off on the outside of the sweater.

This is my new favorite sweater! I love the color, the fit, and the thickness of it and will be ordering it in other colors.
I bought this for my wife, and it looks amazing on her! She absolutely loved it, and it's so flattering on her body. Highly recommend!
Good quality

I absolutely love this sweater. It is oversized without being too big. Extremely cozy! I washed it in the washing machine and hung to dry, and it looks amazing! It is not too thick, but not thin either. I love the inside out seams, and the sleeve and wrist detail. I am 131 lbs and bought a size small. It fits perfect! I chose to tuck the front into my jeans for a more tailored look. Highly recommend 👌
Fit is spot on.  The thickness & quality is amazing.  Buy it!  Very comfortable & soft.  Have not washed yet.  But it looks amazing w/ jeans or leggings.
Looks like im wearing my shirt inside out. The tag and washtag were sewn on what should have been the outside. Other than that great sweater
Fits very well and is super comfy!

This sweater runs true to size for an oversized look.  It is soft and comfortable to wear.  I’ve only washed it twice so far and hung to dry and it has held up so far!  I’m tall and have long arms and it fits me perfectly.
This sweater is awesome.  It's thick and heavy. I got a medium but I'm ordering another one in small. Very impressed. The green is a little darker but it's wonderful. Highly recommend.

I had to give one star, but didn't want to give any. I just received it yesterday. It has a big 7 in snag/gathering of material right in the front in the middle. I can't believe it passed any kind of inspection. I have ordered MANY things on Amazon, and this is the first item I have returned. I am hoping to get a replacement soon, because it is really cute. I want to wear it to a Christmas gathering.

I got this today. I'm still on the fence. Pros: Nice fabric; not too heavy, not too light Overall, I like the stripes. It feels like you borrowed your boyfriend's sweatshirt, only this one you could wear to a nice restaurant with leggings and be fashionably ok. Or you could just hang out at home and not have to worry about sucking your tummy in. You can't see it in this sweater. Cons: It's VERY boxy and VERY oversized. Maybe that's a pro. Depends on how you view it. I don't think downsizing would work because the sleeves and neck size are fine. Debatables: I read the reviews about the seams on the outside. They are on the shoulders. I don't really have a problem with that. It gives a slight definition to your shoulders - almost like the days of shoulder pads but not that pronounced. However, I could see why traditionalists wouldn't like that type of seam. I guess I would say it's stylish sloppy comfy. One or two of those options in the closet isn't a bad idea when you don't feel like working real hard at impressing who is or isn't looking at you.
Am returning. Bought for a gift and it was not a good fit for her.

This sweater is total lovage .. bought it in black and ordered 3 more!  The fit is beautiful and material outstanding.  Ordered XL .. hides my fat arms perfectly.  Hand wash but so what.  I don't spill on my garments so will only wash neck and underarm areas.  Can be worn casual or dress it up with jewelry.  Best investment ever!
I bought the hot pink , the material is fantastic. Loose fit which nI love.. May need to get more. Highly recommend

I loved how soft it was. Even after a wash it’s still soft and super stretchy. I got a small, but it’s still SUPER oversized. I wish the waist was a little tighter, so air didn’t come through but overall my favorite sweater!!
Love this sweater for a cute outfit with leggings and boots. Covers my bum, comfy, is a good quality thickness and cute style. Fits as expected!
I love the color, it’s comfy and it also kept me warm with just a long sleeve shirt on underneath it.

The shirt looks like it was sewn backwards in some areas, especially the sides of the sleeves. Even the photos in the product description has it blurred, if you look closely. This is the definition of fraud. Seller should be ashamed.

评论概述: Not a good design and tag was sewn on the outside
评论详情: I had high hopes for this sweater. Looks so cute online. First of all, the tag was sewn on the outside of the sweater (see pictures). I was going to try and remove it until I put the sweater on. The waistband is sewn smaller than the rest of the sweater, so the hip area bulges out making me look awkward. Needless to say, this is being returned. I’m not even going to order a different one because I’ve seen other comments about the sides sticking out so no need to get my hopes up again.

I really wanted to like this sweater, but they vacuum-sealed it into the packaging, and there was no way for me to remove it from the plastic without damaging it. As you can see in the photos, it left the front of the sweater snagged and I had to return it. Otherwise, I would say that the quality is solid for the price. It feels rich and thick. I'm 140, 34D, and ordered a medium. I'm going to reorder in a small, and hopefully this time, they don't also ruin it with the vacuum seal.
I bought a medium it is so comfortable and does not itch at all. I may buy more in different colors.

You have to throw this sweater next day because poor quality
Very well made, warm, and comfy!

Love this! I’m 4’11 170lbs and I purchased a large. Definitely fits very oversized I could have sized down but I want that oversized look as I’m still postpartum and breastfeeding. I don’t always wear the best bras and usually stick to my comfy nursing bras and I’m able to get away with this shirt and not worrying if I don’t have the best coverage and lift lol. It’s also very stylish can be dressed up or down.
Cute but too bulky on the sides and the side slits don’t help.
Product had a hole at the back and the stitch is reversed on the sleeves so it looks like you’re wearing it inside out when you’re not. Expected a lot from this.

I can’t do a lot of sweaters bc of the texture or materials, but this is dreamy! I sized down one, 38H bust, to Large. I think it fits perfectly with room for comfort. The checked print and softness are so trendy and comfy, will def buy more  colors! I’m 5’9” and the sleeve are actually long enough, as well as sweater length!  Get it!
This is warm and great either way leggings.  A fun top
After a month, this sweater is completely pilled.

This is the second sweater I've purchased in this style, just a different color. I would have give it 5 stars except that it came covered in hair! Perhaps it was a return and the cat or dog slept on it? Kind of gross, but I kept it and laundered it.  I keep seeing reviews stating it looks inside out; it's supposed to look that way.  However, if you turn it wrong side out, you can remove the tags carefully with a seam ripper and wear it that way!
Love how soft the material is.  Great quality for the price. Fits true to size.

This is the perfect weight, warm enough to go without a jacket on a fall day but not sweating when you get indoors.  True to size.  I haven’t washed it yet so I can’t comment on that but if all goes well I’ll be buying more.
My daughter’s senior night theme was “pink out” and this sweater was perfect!  I’m 5’4 and 150lbs and it fit perfectly. I got a ton of compliments.

Purchased this sweater on sale… glad I did, as I would have returned it otherwise.  The quality is good, but not in my opinion worth the full asking price.

Absolutely love! Has been my go to sweater! Size and wash ability it great!
TOO BOXY on me.  Nice Material though.

I love the sweater, fabric is a heavy, cozy sweater type fabric, not like a jersey sweatshirt fabric. BUT, the construction is weird. It's kind of inside out? Is that called 'deconstructed' style? Idk, but it looks so much better when I turned it inside out (where the shoulder and side seams are now inside and out of sight as they should be). So I just cut out the back label and the side care label. So much better. So comfy!! Nutmeg for the win, and I wish they had more lighter colors available.

The sweater is super soft and much better quality than I expected. It does run big, so I suggest ordering one size down as suggested by others. You’ll still have an oversized look without it looking sloppy.  Looking forward to buying more colors!
Loved the quality, style and ability to dress up or down.

Very soft and fits amazing. Definitely worth the price. It’s true to size and gives the perfect oversized vibe. Washes well. I ended up buying another one in a different color I loved it so much.

I waited to give my review until I washed and dried it, and it held up great.

I love the material, the length is perfect for leggings or a mini skirt, and the split hem is an added feature. It’s soft but hold its own form which is what I was looking for. It’s thick enough but not heavy. I just ordered another color.

This sweater is beautiful! It looks great with jeans, shorts, and leggings. This color
